data.comment: Today's referee, Vasiliy Kazarcev, has blown to start the match.
Sochi drive upfield and Kirill Zaika gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Spartak Moscow defender.
In the minute 4, Kirill Zaika (Sochi) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Spartak Moscow goal kick.
Spartak Moscow have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 7, Spartak Moscow's Ayrton Lucas is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 7, Goal! Aleksandr Sobolev gives Spartak Moscow a 1-0 lead in Moscow.
Great play from Roman Zobnin to set up the goal.
Spartak Moscow's Aleksandr Sobolev has been booked in Moscow.
In the minute 10, Great finish from Jordan Larsson to give Spartak Moscow a 2-0 lead.
Zelimkhan Bakaev with an assist there.
Free kick for Sochi in the half of Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 14, Sochi have been awarded a penalty in Moscow...
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a Sochi throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half.
Goal! Sochi now trail just 2-1 thanks to a Dmitri Poloz spot-kick.
In the minute 17, Sochi to take a throw-in in Spartak Moscow territory.
In Moscow Sochi attack through Dmitri Poloz. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Spartak Moscow at Otkritie Arena.
In the minute 17, Vasiliy Kazarcev awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick Sochi.
Ball safe as Spartak Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 22, Spartak Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Spartak Moscow are pushing forward but Aleksandr Sobolev's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
In the minute 27, In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Vasiliy Kazarcev.
In the minute 33, Can Sochi get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half?
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a throw-in for Sochi, close to Spartak Moscow's area.
Spartak Moscow's Zelimkhan Bakaev gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 35, Sochi have a goal kick.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Sochi.
Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 37, Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Sochi in their own half.
Vasiliy Kazarcev blows against Sochi's Dmitri Poloz for offside.
Throw-in for Sochi in their own half.
In the minute 40, Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
At Otkritie Arena, Sergey Terekhov has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Maksim Glushenkov gets his shot on target but fails to score for Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 42, Sochi drives forward and Nikita Burmistrov gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Sochi at Otkritie Arena.
Corner awarded to Sochi.
In the minute 44, Sochi's Miha Mevlja attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Vasiliy Kazarcev awards Spartak Moscow a goal kick.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Spartak Moscow's Maksim Glushenkov breaks free at Otkritie Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Vasiliy Kazarcev awards Sochi a goal kick.
Roman Zobnin for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Otkritie Arena.
The second-half has started.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 46, Vasiliy Kazarcev awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Sochi in the half of Spartak Moscow.
Christian Noboa for Sochi gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 47, Ball goes out of play for a Spartak Moscow goal kick.
Goal kick for Sochi at Otkritie Arena.
Throw-in for Sochi in the half of Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 50, It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
The home team replace Pavel Maslov with Ilya Gaponov.
In the minute 54, Sochi have been awarded a corner by Vasiliy Kazarcev.
Domenico Tedesco (Spartak Moscow) is making a first substitution, with Ezequiel Ponce replacing Maksim Glushenkov.
Christian Noboa (Sochi) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Sochi have been awarded a corner by Vasiliy Kazarcev.
In the minute 56, Ivan Miladinovic of Sochi gets in a strike, but is off target.
Spartak Moscow have a goal kick.
Throw-in Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 59, Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Sochi in their own half.
Alex Kral of Spartak Moscow smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 62, In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ayrton Lucas for Spartak Moscow gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Sochi goal kick.
In the minute 63, Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Sochi.
Corner awarded to Sochi.
Can Sochi get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half?
In the minute 65, Nemchenko Anatoliy Igorevich is replacing Nikita Burmistrov for the away team.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow at Otkritie Arena.
Spartak Moscow's Jordan Larsson misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 68, Goal kick for Sochi at Otkritie Arena.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Spartak Moscow are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 72, The away team have replaced Ivan Novoseltsev with Elmir Nabiullin. This is the second substitution made today by Vladimir Fedotov.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a Sochi throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half.
Spartak Moscow needs to be cautious. Sochi have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 73, Can Sochi capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Spartak Moscow's half?
Ball safe as Spartak Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Sochi in the half of Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 74, Jordan Larsson (Spartak Moscow) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Sochi pushes forward through Dmitri Poloz, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Sochi.
In the minute 76, Christian Noboa (Sochi) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Spartak Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Nail Umyarov is on a sub for Zelimkhan Bakaev for Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 77, Elmir Nabiullin (Sochi) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 79, Vasiliy Kazarcev awards Sochi a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 82, Spartak Moscow to take a throw-in in Sochi territory.
Timofey Margasov is booked for the away team.
Spartak Moscow's Ezequiel Ponce is on target but unsuccessful.
Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 84, Alex Kral (Spartak Moscow) gets a yellow card.
Sochi make their third substitution with Anton Zabolotnyi replacing Dmitri Poloz.
Ball safe as Spartak Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Sochi.
In the minute 86, Ilya Gaponov (Spartak Moscow) has received a yellow card from Vasiliy Kazarcev.
Sochi are coming forward and Christian Noboa gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 87, It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
Sochi have been given a penalty...
Sochi are in shooting range from this free kick.
Throw-in Spartak Moscow.
It's 2-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
Goal! Christian Noboa makes it 2-2. The equalizer came in the form of a penalty.
Aleksandr Maksimenko (Spartak Moscow) gets a yellow card.
Nail Umyarov (Spartak Moscow) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
